amendment.description: To strike the paragraph of the bill that rescinds $15,000,000 that had been appropriated for the United States Institute of Peace.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2863 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 409.

action.text: Amendment SA 2863 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 2853.
